title: 'Quite good'
body: It is classic nivea fragrance...so fresh and refreshing...the lock system is quite useful...doesn't last long though...wish they had perfumes with this similar fragrance

title: 'Long lasting'
body: 'Mild fragrance  gives protection against sweat and odour for at least 8-10 hours if you‚Äôre not doing a lot of physical activity. If active it still stops the body odour very well for as long as 5 hours. The fragrance of the product stays for 2 days if you don‚Äôt wash it off.'

title: 'Duplicate.only gas. I donot use now. Cheating with coustemering.in'
'New Formula is terrible!!!!'
body: 'This new change of bottle design actually has a change of formula and smell! I‚Äôve used the old Nivea deo for decades and the last time they changed the packaging the formula was the same as the old one. But the new one is HORRIBLE. They have downgraded the formula and it smells bad and is burning in my underarms which has NEVER happened before. Didn‚Äôt expect this from a big company like Nivea most cheap perfumes in deos cause headaches for me and the old Ocean Extracts deo was fantastic. Please fire whatever idiot decided to change that formula and use cheap chemicals and brand it as a simple ‚Äúbottle change‚Äù. BRING THE OLD OCEAN EXTRACTS BACK! Or there will be a drop in sales for sure. Buyers : beware this is not the old Ocean Extracts Fresh Nivea deo. Now I have to go through the nightmare of buyin and testing other brands and finding one that is gentle on skin and doesn‚Äôt cause cheap perfume allergies :('

title: 'Burnt my skin'
body: 'In India on holiday and ran out of deo. Got these and it burns when I use it. I have used the same deo abroad and it‚Äôs not the same. The smell is horrible too. Not fresh like it is suppose to be!'

title: 'Refreshed feel'
body: Instant refreshing feel even if you sweat heavily (I use it only after a perfect wipe with tissue towels in a burst of sweat). Doesn't leave residue. Mild yet pleasant fragrance.

title: 'Broken deodorant bottle with missing cap... horrible'
'Packaging can be improved'
body: Good and mild fragrance. Yet to see if it's long lasting. The bottle was not sealed and it seems light weight. So makes one wonder if a used bottle was delivered. Seller should make sure that atleast online purchased items are sealed properly for the sake of authenticity.

title: 'Keeps the stink away all day'
body: It's my everyday deodorant. No noticeable BO whenever I've got this on, even in extreme humidity.
